_addreputationPoints(address,address,uin.details: this function calls StartFiReputation contract to mint reputation points for both seller and buyer

_calcBidDisputeFees(uint256).details: calculat the platform share when seller call disput

params.qualifyAmount: : seller defind value to be staked in order to participate in a gevin auction

returns.fineAmount: the value that the platform will get
returns.remaining: the value that the auction woner will get

returns.fees: the value that the platform will get

params.newBase: the new basefees value to be stored
params.newFees: the new fees value to be stored

returns.percentage: the value of the state variable `_feeFraction`

params.newBase: the new basefees value to be stored
params.newFees: the new fees value to be stored

returns.percentage: the value of the state variable `_feeFraction`

params.newBase: the new basefees value to be stored
params.newFees: the new fees value to be stored

returns.percentage: the value of the state variable `_feeFraction`

_changeReputationContract(address).details: for later on upgrade , if we have

_changeUtiltiyToken(address).details: for later on upgrade , if we have

_deduct(address,address,uint256).details: this function calls StartFiStakes contract to subtract the user stakes and add that value to the 'to'

params.amount: : value to be deducted from his stakes as a fine

_getAllowance(address).details: :wrap function to get the total allowed number of tokens that this contract can transfer from the given account

returns._0: allowed number of tokens that this contract can transfer from the owner account

_getDeListingQualAmount(uint256).details: calculat the platform fine amount when seller delist before time

returns.fineAmount: the value that the platform will get
returns.remaining: the value remaing after subtracting the fine

_getListingQualAmount(uint256).details: calculat the platform fine amount when seller delist before time

returns.amount: the value that the platform will get

_getStakeAllowance(address).details: this function calls StartFiStakes contract to get the total staked tokens for 'user' an substract the current reserves to get the total number of free tokens

returns._0: allowed number of tokens that this contract can transfer from the owner account

_safeTokenTransferFrom(address,address,u.details: Safely transfers `amount` of token from `from` to `to`.

params.amount: number of tokens to be transferred See {transferFrom}
params.from: address representing the previous owner of the token
params.to: target address that will receive the tokens

params.newReservedValue: : value to be sored as user reserve

_updateUserReserves(address,uint256,bool.details: called to increase or decrease user reserves

params.isAddition: : true if we are adding the new value
params.newReserves: : value to be added or substracted

bid(bytes32,uint256).details: called by dapps to bid on an auction

buyNow(bytes32,uint256).details: called by buyer through dapps when s/he wants to buy a gevin NFT  token from the marketplace

params.newBase: the new basefees value to be stored
params.newFees: the new fees value to be stored

returns.percentage: the value of the state variable `_feeFraction`

createAuction(address,uint256,uint256,ui.details: called by dapps to create  new auction

params.qualifyAmount: amount of token locked as qualify for any bidder wants bid
params.sellFor: price  to sell with if sellForEnabled=true
params.sellForEnabled: true if auction enable direct selling

deList(bytes32).details: called by seller through dapps when s/he wants to remove this token from the marketplace

disputeAuction(bytes32).details: called by seller through dapps when his/her auction is  not fullfilled after 3 days

freeReserves().details: called by user through dapps when his/her wants to free his reserved tokens which are no longer in active auction or listing

returns.curentReserves: user reserves after freeing the unused reservd

fullfillBid(bytes32).details: called by bidder through dapps when bidder win an auction and wants to pay to get the NFT

getAuctionBidDetails(bytes32,address).details: called by dapp or any contract to get info about a given bidder in a listing

getListingDetails(bytes32).details: called by dapp or any contract to get info about a gevin listing

returns.listingPrice: initial price or minimum price that the seller can accept
returns.qualifyAmount: amount of token locked as qualify for any bidder wants bid
returns.sellFor: if sell for enabled for auction, this should be more than zero
returns.sellForEnabled: true if auction enable direct selling

returns._0: the value of the state variable `_feeFraction`

listOnMarketplace(address,uint256,uint25.details: called by dapps to list new item

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

winnerBid(bytes32).details: called by dapp or any contract to get info about a winner bid

devdoc.title: StartFi MarketPlace desc  marketplace with all functions for item selling by either ceating auction or selling with fixed prices, the contract auto transfer orginal NFT issuer's shares

buyNow(bytes32,uint256).notice: if auction, the seller must enabe forSale. prices should be more than or equal the listing price

changeFees(uint256,uint256).notice: all conditions and checks are made prior to this function

deList(bytes32).notice: auction can't be canceled , if seller delist time on sale on maretplace before time to delist, he will pay a fine

disputeAuction(bytes32).notice: after auction with winner bid . bidder didn't call fullfile within 3 days of auction closing  auction owner can call dispute to delist and punish the spam winner bidder fine is share between the plateform and the auction owner

freeReserves().notice: this function is greedy, called by user only when s/he wants rather than force the check & updates with every transaction which might be very costly .
